I could be a director or co director.

We really need script writers more than anything else

Name: SHiftER2O

Job: Script Writer

Why do you want to do this job: It's in demand, and I have experience.

Previous Work: Sparrowhawk Aeronautics Replica Employee, Blackbird Aviation CEO,

Reviewing the script, I can see it needs a lot of... a lot of work. First off, that was just the plot overview, there's no details inserted on executing a proper scene-by-scene action. And here's the flaw: You're adding details to a plot overview, a plot overview is supposed to be simple and straight to the point. We'll need script writers who can separate and extract the juicy scenes in the plot over view and expound on them more in their own basis. We'll need revisions of some parts, proper words to describe certain scenes, and proper divisions in plot details so as not to have this spaghetti mess of a plot overboard that switch between super-microscopic-detailed and ultra-philosophical vague.

The melting pot of ideas though, I find quite attractive. The ideas are already there, all we need is an organizer, and we'll be set. And in the first place, we need to determine whether or not the plot is a oneshot or an arc. If you're planning to make a film that's, let's say one that's standalone, it's best to have a plot that's quite simple but having a wide potential to be expanded over time. There are many ways to do this, and with the abundance of ideas I doubt if we'd ever run out.

Note to SHiftER; Looks like hanging out with the linguistics paid off in a slight...

Name: pandoras kitten

Job: Builder

Why do you want to do this job:

I have an eye for detail and have built a huge array of ridiculous KSP craft never before seen in KSP, such as mobile restaurants, aircraft with ridiculously complex rotating or folding wing designs, and large helicopters (roflcopters?!) nearly 100 tons in weight. All are flyable and certainly decent at their job, if operated within realistic expectations.

Also, a

! Aww...

Wait, did I proclaim "never before seen in KSP"? Like this

? Yeah...

Previous Work:

Please refer to my YouTube channel (see signature) and maybe my imgur galleries for a selection of elegant craft riding on the edge of practicality. Well, recently I have built some low part count utility aircraft... If you want a showcase of my KSP craft, feel free to take a look at my page on KerbalX too.

Oh and a

, in response to a Twitter post on 1st April this year from SCS Software, makers of the real Truck Simulator games Edited June 17, 2015 by pandoras kitten

Hope to work with you soon.
